resources.string:
Hi, my name is Tariq. 

I am a biological student with a graduation in mechanical engineering but now pursuing mobile application development. 
That sound's great right! 
But i messed up my life and oppurtunities and failed at every step of my life , the typical word to describe me is a "Loser". 
Its totally because of my unawareness and childishness. 

The loser finally landed here in application development. 
I dont know whether i will succeed in this career or not. 
But i will keep trying my best to deliver the best of mine.Insha Allah!
